```{r my.theme, include=TRUE}
my.theme <- theme(
  plot.title = element_text(family="Gill Sans MT", color="black", face="bold", size=24, hjust=0), 
  plot.subtitle = element_text(family="Gill Sans MT", color="black", size=12, hjust=0), 
  axis.title = element_text(family="Gill Sans MT", color="black", size=12), 
  axis.text = element_text(family="Gill Sans MT", color="black", size=18), 
  axis.ticks.y = element_blank(), 
  plot.caption = element_text(family="Gill Sans MT", color="black", size=12), 
  plot.background = element_blank(),
  panel.background =  element_blank(), 
  legend.background = element_blank(), 
  panel.grid.major = element_line(colour = "grey90", size = 0.5),
  panel.grid.minor = element_line(colour = "grey93", size = 0.5),
  panel.border = element_blank(), 
  #panel.border = element_rect(colour = "black", size = 0.5, fill=NA, linetype = 1),
  legend.title=element_blank(), 
  legend.text = element_text(family="Gill Sans MT", color="black", size=12, hjust=0),
  legend.position = 'top',
  strip.text = element_text(family="Gill Sans MT", color="black", size=14))
```

```{r read_data, include=TRUE}
GET("https://query.data.world/s/vihrcc3hjn3umv2dy67iu2zxuyf2en", write_disk(tf <- tempfile(fileext = ".xlsx")))
df <- read_excel(tf) %>% 
  clean_names()
```


```{r financial_sectors, include=TRUE}
financial_sector <- c('Financial services - other', 
                      'Financial services - insurance',
                      'Financial services - banking')

industry_cols <- c('Financial' = 'darkorange2',
                   'Other' = 'gray60')
```

```{r mutate_df, include=TRUE}
df <- df %>% 
  mutate(financial_sector = 
           ifelse(industry_sector %in% financial_sector,
                  'Financial', 'Other')) 
```

```{r glimpse, include=TRUE}
df %>% 
  glimpse()
```

```{r summary, include=TRUE}
df %>% 
  summary()
```

# Visualizations  



```{r fig.height=6.2}
df %>% 
  ggplot(.) + 
  geom_col(aes(x=respondents_percent / 100,
               y=reorder(industry_sector, respondents_percent),
               fill=financial_sector)) + 
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(0, .15),
                     labels = percent) + 
  scale_fill_manual(values = industry_cols) + 
  coord_polar() + 
  my.theme + 
  theme(legend.position = 'none')
```

```{r fig.height=6.2}
df %>% 

  ggplot(.) + 
  geom_bar(aes(x=respondents_percent,
               y=industry_sector,
               fill=financial_sector), 
           position = 'stack') + 

  my.theme
```


```{r fig.height=6.2}
df %>% 
  filter(financial_sector == 'Financial') %>% 
  ggplot(.) + 
  geom_bar(aes(x=respondents_percent /100, 
               y=reorder(industry_sector, respondents_percent),
               fill=financial_sector),
           #position = 'stack', 
           stat='identity') + 
  scale_fill_manual(values = industry_cols) + 
  scale_x_continuous(labels = percent,
                     limits = c(0, 1)) + 
  coord_polar() + 
  my.theme + 
  theme(legend.position = 'none')
```
